description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用�ИO的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

notes: 工管大二合開;計中電腦教室

name.zh: 資訊與通訊科技在工業工程之應用
name.en: Information and Communication Technologies for Industrial Engineering

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的Mobile Internet新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備，因此，當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，工業工程系責無旁貸的需將行動運算納入考量。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解雲端運算在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂服務導向的企業，以及提供進階之程式開發知識，與跨入3G最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

notes: 大三合開;計中電腦教室

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh:
將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，
應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en:
To practice product model building techniques . 
Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 室內設計場景細部的處理，例如進階的燈光及材質表現，同時培養同學互相討論與問題解決。
description.en: The sophisticated treatment for the scene of indoor design, like advanced light and material performance, which can train classmates to have the capacity of mutual discussion and problem-solving at the same time.

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

name.zh: 室內設計與裝修證照概論
name.en: License of Interior Design and Decoration

description.zh: 整合學科與術科兩大部分，本課程介紹【建築物室內設計】與【建築物室內裝修工程管理】專業技能檢定事宜。參酌最新專業議題並研習歷屆考試題庫，課程加強學／術科模擬考試訓練，期使學校養成教育與設計界之專業需求得以結合。
description.en: Integrating the Knowledge and Technology parts of the Interior design profession, the course introduces the practice of National Skill Test of Interior design and Project Management. Concerning not just the updated ideas and the historical questions, it stresses also the intensive stimulated test so as to link the educational achievement and the professional expectation.

name.zh: 個性化產品設計與開發實作
name.en: Design and Development of Customization Products

description.zh: 本課程應用系統性創新/TRIZ 萃思發明問題的解決理論/設計思考/QFD 四 階段品質機能展開，透過跨領域團隊合作，結合新科技趨勢、數位經濟、 平台經濟與共享經濟，與 C2M 消費者直通製造廠商業模式，進行眾設模式 個性化產品開發設計之實作。
description.en: The objectives of the course are to learn how to apply Systematic Innovation/TRIZ (Theory of Inventive Problem Solving)/Design Thinking/QFD, the four stages of quality function deployment into integrating new trends of technology, digital economic, platform economic and sharing economic with Customer-to-Manufacturer (C2M), business model, to advance the practice of crowd design platform and to personalize products design development through interdisciplinary team-working as well as collaborating.

name.zh: 離岸風電之電力電子技術
name.en: Power Electronic Technologies for Offshore Wind Farms

description.zh: 有鑒於台灣政府近年大力推行離岸風電政策與技術，培育離岸風電相關專業人才為當前首要目標。本課程之主旨為離岸風電之電力電子技術。風力發電之電能轉換，首先透過葉片旋轉帶動發電機產生交流電，然而，此交流電之頻率會因風速以及發電機之轉速而異，因此，需透過電力電子技術，將此變頻之交流電，藉由一交流-直流轉換器，轉換為直流電形式，再透過一與電網連結之直流-交流變頻器，方能將風力發電之電能饋入電力系統中。本課程之大綱可分為: (1)課程介紹、(2)電力轉換裝置與儲能系統之概述、(3)直流-直流轉換技術與裝置、(4)交流-直流轉換技術與裝置、(5)儲能系統之規格與技術、(6)直流-交流變頻器之概述、(7)變頻器之電路架構、(8)變頻器之控制技術、(9)變頻器之數位訊號處理、(10)變頻器之功率元件介紹、(11)直流鏈電壓調控策略與(12)變頻器併網之低電壓穿越技術。
description.en: Due to the offshore wind farm policy of Taiwan’s government, cultivation of talent of the offshore wind farm technologies has become the primary target. The main purpose of this course is providing knowledge of power electronics technologies for offshore wind farms. In order to transfer the wind power energy to the grid, an ac-dc converter integrated with a dc-ac inverter is necessary. The front-end ac-dc converter will convert the variable ac voltage to dc voltage while the dc-ac inverter will connect to the grid as well as convert the dc voltage to constant frequency ac voltage. Main topics of this course will be: (1) Introduction of this course, (2) Introduction of power conversion devices and energy storage systems, (3) Dc-dc power conversion technologies and devices, (4) Ac-dc power conversion technologies and devices, (5) Specifications and technologies of the energy storage system, (6) Introduction of the dc-ac inverter, (7) Circuit topologies of the dc-ac inverter, (8) Control

notes: 電機大四與電機所合開

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論專利申請後的答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practice of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in this class.

notes: 智財所與電機大四合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生通過包浩斯開啟的基礎幾何練習，理解點、線、面，乃至線條、方塊、色彩等元素影響視覺性、閱讀性的因素，最後，通過與藝術理論的交互驗證和課堂討論，以進入當代藝術創作精神。
description.en:
The course aims to explore the possibilities with forms, lines, rhythms, and content in contemporary visual arts. The pedagogy of the course is inspired from the Bauhaus, which is one of the most significant modern movements in the history of art and design.  
In class, the mission is to guide the students to experiment the variety of geometric shapes, from lines to circles and from circles to triangles, pursuing the essence and the spirits within the contemporary art. As practicing visual arts, the students not only learn how to develop an artwork, but also rethink the significant relation between art forms and meanings through the tutor-led and group discussions.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en:
Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  
giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

description.zh: 本課程講授內容兼顧理論與實務。促使學習土木工程學生瞭解施工安全及衛生的重要性，如何規劃推動各項安全管理實務工作。確認施工觀念，發揮全面防災功能，確保施工安全與衛生。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: Safety and disaster preclusion of opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering etc.

notes: 土木大三大四合開/上限30人

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

name.zh: 無人機攝影測量概論與實作

description.zh: 運用無人機技術做為測遙工具為一新穎科技，本課程以航空動力學為前題，分別介紹定翼及旋翼型無人機運作原理，基於航空攝影目的介紹飛行及航拍任務規劃。同時藉由實作，學生將自行組裝及設計無人機，並實際自行拍攝影像、產製所需之空間資訊，如:正射、地形等地理資訊系統圖資。
description.en: The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV), commonly known as a drone, is an aircraft without human pilot on board that flies autonomously, and is now been used widely for many aspects because of its convenience, high resolution, efficiency, etc. This course introducing first the aerodynamic of different drone frames, as well as the basic photogrammetry. Then try to design and assembly our drones. By using the home-made drones, the students will learn how to do the mission planning and take photos. Finally, the students should generate the geomatic information from their acquired images.

notes: 土木大三與防災所合開/ 大學25人

name.en: Introduction of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 講授土木工程領域之相關災害的種類、特性、影響，如地震、洪泛、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染等。探討其災害消減及預防規劃，並藉由風險管理的觀念介紹緊急應變計畫的準則。
description.en:
This course introduces the types, characteristics and 
influences of civil engineering related disasters or hazards, such as earthquakes, floods, solpe failures, debris flows, and construction incidents. The hazard mitigation and precaution will also be discussed in class. By the concepts of risk management, the principle of emergency response plan will be introduced.

description.zh: 使學者了解水利工程實務及水利工程設計之基本原則。課程內容概要：(1)水利工程概述、(2)發電計畫、(3)有效落差(4)水路設計、(5)水路結構物設計、(6)水路結構物維護(7)其它。
description.en:
Scientific basis of the hydrologic cycle and its engineering 
implications;rainfall-runoff process,hydrographs,flood routing,and statisticalmethods.

description.zh: 使學者了解含地下水之水文循環概念、水文與統計之結合及實務講解，使理論與實務結合。課程內容概要：(1)水文學重點複習、(2)地下水、(3)小集水區洪峰流量推估、(4)洪水演算、(5)水文統計－頻率分析、(6)水文模式、(7)實例研析或專題討論。
description.en: Scientific basis of the hydrologic cycle and its engineering implications;rainfall-runoff process,hydrographs,flood routing,and statistical methods.

notes: 土木大三合開/上限40人【停開】

description.zh: (1)馬克斯威爾方程式，勞倫斯電磁定律，波印亭定律 (2)平面電磁波：電磁波極化，電磁波之行進波之反射、折射、駐波 (3)導波理論：平行波導，矩形波導，介質波導 (4)傳輸線與史密斯圖表 (5)天線理論：位能函數，半波天線及天線陣列。
description.en:
To familiarize the student with basic principles,methods,and tools of computer graphics.

Topics include :

1.Generation of 2D and 3D gometruc shapes

2.2D and 3D transformation

3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 

4.Color principles 

5.Shading and shadowing techniques

The student will be nequired to write computer programs and/or use modeling/redendering packages

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

description.zh:
本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力
與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

notes: 共同科館演講廳;化工大四與化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh:
本課程研究建築細部設計，並幫助學生發展建築和其組成元素之間的關係的理解，藉由分析和設計練習如何建造的邏輯、建築元素的製造與組構，接頭、以及整個結構的組織構成，以確保具備技能來面對在建築細部設計中的挑戰。
本課程也透過各種材料和工法的探究，以及銜接設計概念與構築過程，為學生在細部設計上提供多樣化的創作可能性。
description.en:
The course studies architectural detailing, and helps students to develop an understanding of the relationship of architecture and its elements, for ensuring their skills and capabilities to the challenges in detailing for architectures as well as researching the existing cases in built examples, through one series of trainings of analyzing and practicing the logic of construction, fabrication of architectural elements, joints, and the organization of entire structures. 
By engaging in various aspects of materials and methods, this course aims to provide students the unlimited creative possibilities in Detail Design by making connections between the design concept and fabrication processes.

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理
description.en: 1.	Introduction of the construction organization   2.	Introduction of the operation in the construction site  3.	Budget and cost control management   4.	Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

name.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務

description.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務內容包括輪胎平衡與校正、車輛四輪定位診斷與校正、輪胎拆卸操作與油電系統故障的檢測。學生將學習儀器操作的基本要求，並練習熟練適當工具的使用，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: Automotive diagnostic equipment operating practices include tire balance, vehicle wheel alignment, Changing tire operation and hybrid electric system failures inspections. Students will learn the basic requirements of instrument operation and practice with appropriate tools. This course focuses on the implementation of the exercise.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。
description.en: Automobile Chassis Service Shop Practice , the basic inspection, adjustment and repair of Automobile Chassis System, Include the Automobile Suspension systems, Steering systems and Braking systems, Tire Repair and Balance practice, Wheel-Alignment practice , Chassis dynamometer Experiment , Brake performance and Slide Test .

description.zh:
先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車電系實習，包括：引擎電系，起動系統及充電系統檢測，點火系統檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系統檢測，電腦診斷系統，檢測車輛新式電子設備，檢修汽車空調系統。
95學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容: 結構力學分析與實習。學生將學習使用套裝電腦應用軟體，了解並學習如何做常用的結構力學前處理、分析及後處理。 課程著重學生實作練習。
description.en:
Automobile Electrical System Service Shop Practice , Include Service of the Engine Electrical System , Starting and Charging System, Ignition System, Battery inspection and replacement, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System, New Electronic Equipment Inspection , Air Condition Test and Repair.
For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , this class is to utilize computers to do the experiments on different vehicle/engineering problems. Student will learn the basic concept of Finite Element Method (FEM), learn how to utilize FEM in Vehicle Engineering to solve problems. Classes include Geometry modeling, creating FEA models, learning different analysis types (such as Statics, Normal mode, Buckling, and Optimization).

先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車電系實習，包括：引擎電系，起動系統及充電系統檢測，點火系統檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系統檢測，電腦診斷系統，檢測車輛新式電子設備，檢修汽車空調系統。

description.zh: 負責教授同意。介紹現代化的電腦整合製造系統及機械製造工程師的主要任務－工作準備、製造、安裝及檢驗。同時，簡介機械製造工程師必備的知識：如重要的工程材料；機械加工重要程序之原理，包括材料成形，變形，去除，連接及表面處理等技術；工作機械之構造及其控制技術（機械式、油壓式及數值控制）；自動化生產系統；量測技術及品管。
description.en:
Introduction to Modern Computer Integrated Manufacturing System and Manufacturing Planning, Manufacturing Operation, Assembly and Inspection. Meanwhile, discuss the essential knowledge of manufacturing engineer, Engineering Materials, Principles of Manufacturing Process, as Casting, Forming, Material-Removing, Joining and Surface Technology, Machine Tool Structures and its control Technologies, 
Automatic Production Systems, Metrology and Quality Control.

description.zh: 導論（含系統概論、資料表示法），微電腦結構－中央處理單元，組合語言－指令型定址法，模組化程式，位元組和字串處裡，I/O 程式，DOS 功能常式，多元程式規劃，系統匯流排結構，I/O 介面，半導體記憶，多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, System Bus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: This course will provide students with the computational fundamental skills necessary to plan and manage the construction management (such as schedule, cost, and quality management) using related computer project management software or system packages. Students will learn to mix and match available resources in the most efficient combinations to complete projects on time and within budget. Furthermore, the student may utilize computational programming to efficiently plan and execute municipal infrastructure programs (simulations and analysis) and support contractors’ decisions in constrained projects.

notes: 土木大三大四合開/上限25人

description.zh:
近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1)了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2)評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3)新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。
學習成效：學生可獲得：
(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。
(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。
(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en:
The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.
Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, students will

notes: 土木大三大四與防災所合開/大學部25人

description.zh: 本課程為傳統攝影的影像處理訓練。透過傳統暗房的操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念，可以訓練學生對事物的敏感度，耐心細心。
description.en: This course is a traditional photographic image processing training. Through traditional darkroom operations, training students the concept of image quality, sensitivity to things students can be trained, patient care.

description.zh: 本課程將與結合社區力量，透過對艋舺龍山寺周邊人文歷史、社會民俗、商業變遷等，討論艋舺代表性的台灣本土文化。
description.en: The course will combine the power of the community, through the periphery of the Longshan Temple in Wanhua human history, social customs, commerce, etc. Changes to discuss Monga representative of Taiwanese culture.

notes: 大碩合開課；人數上限大學部25人、碩班10人

description.zh: 本課程將與結合社區力量，透過對艋舺龍山寺周邊人文歷史、社會民俗、商業變遷等，討論艋舺代表性的台灣本土文化。
description.en: The course will combine the power of the community, through the periphery of the Longshan Temple in Wanhua human history, social customs, commerce, etc. Changes to discuss Monga representative of Taiwanese culture.

notes: 大碩合開；人數上限大學部25人、碩班10人

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh: 當代飾品設計及製作是一門以實作為主，實務講述為輔的設計性課程。透過實務教學進行，提供學生基礎金工珠寶的製作能力並進行應用。課程旨在結合金屬工藝與多元媒材的當代趨勢，引導學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: This course will use a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and practical experiences to educate the student in the basic skills required to work as a member of jewelry design discipline. This class will also be an introduction to the multiple media of design. Contemporary Jewelry Design will provide an overview of the professional world of Jewelry design through a practical exhibition.

notes: 共科9樓工藝教室，人數上限18人

name.en: The Marketing and Management of Cultural Industry

description.zh: 本課程旨在以文化事業發展為目標，將品牌價值極大化作為核心，分析新創品牌之經營策略，進而設計與執行品牌之行銷方案，以及創造出文化產業中的優勢品牌與品牌資產。
description.en: The course is designed to target the culture vocational development, emphasize the maximum of a brand value, decompose the strategy of a new brand value, design and implement its marketing programs, and then create the advantages of the brand equity in the cultural industry.

name.zh: 產業發展與文化資產專題

description.zh: 本課程探討產業發展歷程中，產業文化資產的出現、保存與再利用等課題。透過文獻研讀、議題討論、國內外個案研討、實地參訪、參與學術研討會、作業報告等方式，學習三課題：1.產業發展歷程中文化資產的出現、保存與再利用；2.我國產業文化資產清查保存與再生計畫之核心主軸；3.民間運用產業文化資產開發新事業。
description.en: This course explores the issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial Cultural Heritage in the process of industrial development. Through the literature study, discussion topics, domestic and foreign case studies, field visits, participation in academic seminars, job reports, etc., to learn 3 topics ：1.The issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial ccultural heritage in the process of industrial development , 2. The core spindle of Taiwan's Government industrial heritage inventory preservation and regeneration plan, 3. Private sector utilize industrial ccultural heritage to develop new businesses.

notes: 大碩合開/創新創業課程【停開】

description.zh: 本課程將分理論、作品研讀與實地操作三部份。首先介紹口述歷史與田野調查理論。之後透過研讀相關作品瞭解該主題之歷史。在理論與實例示範的基礎之下，修課學生擬定田野調查地或口述主題，並定期報告進行情況，期末需有成果報告的分享與討論。
description.en: This course is divided into theory, work study and field operation. Under the basis of theory and model demonstration, students will choose one topic and report it regularly. At the end of this semester, a final report is needed.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

notes: 籃球A(畢)/組隊方式選課，請洽授課教師，分機3305

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

notes: 籃球B(畢)/組隊方式選課，請洽授課教師，分機3305

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

notes: 機械一甲乙合開 限40人 綜科328

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學相當課程或負責教授同意。 數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，布林代數與卡諾圖，組合邏輯電路設計與應用，多工器與解多工器，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to digital circuits, digital systems and coding, basic logic operations, Boolean algebra and Karnaugh-map, combinational logic circuit design and applications, multiplexer and demultiplexer, flip-flop, register, sequential logic circuit design and applications, counter and timer, shift register and memory, introduction to micro-processor.

description.zh: 本課程以“智能工業生產教學工廠”為學習場域，是一間無人的關燈工廠，這間智能工廠的建置完全與廠商實際生產需求結合，全球最大高階自行車變速器製造商美商速聯公司(SRAM)林孟輝總廠長擔任建廠諮詢顧問，整間工廠完全由北科大跨系所老師帶領學生自行建置，這是一間全國大學第一條由老師帶領學生團隊自行建置完成的智能化生產製造產線，產線包括加工區、精密量測區、線上品管區、組裝區、自動倉儲，從接受訂單到智能化排單、加工、量測、品管、組裝、倉儲，所有雲端伺服器與程式軟體完全由學生自行架設與撰寫，是一條完全無人化的關燈展示生產與教學工廠。上課方式是廠商針對智能工廠各個工作細節具體提出實務需求，再由上課老師帶學生助教以此些問題作為上課基礎，教導學生共同解決，學生以班級為單位進入工廠實作學習，課程由負責建置“智能工業生產教學工廠”的老師依其專長領域分工合作開課，依據老師負責建置的部分及其專長進行分工教學，學生分組由個別老師帶領指導，學生將可依序學到完整工廠技術，學期結束再由各專長老師依照學生分組指導學生進行專題報告，學生的專題報告將以個別老師專長協助解決的問題撰寫報告，這樣的設計可以讓學生深入了解與探討如何解決問題。
description.en: This course is based on the intelligent manufacturing system education factory which is an unmanned and turn off the light factory. The intelligent factory is completely built by ourselves and is the only one self-built factory in Taiwanese universities. Building the intelligent factory is cooperated with SRAM, a global bicycle parts manufacturer, and their director Jacky Lin is our technical consultant. The intelligent manufacturing system has seven areas, central server, reception, automatic warehouse, manufacturing, measuring, on-line quality control, and assembly. In process, we receive the raw materials and scanned by QR code scanner. After scanned, the raw materials are transported to the warehouse and wait for producing order. If the producing order received, the raw materials will be sent through all seven machines, where a finished component will be manufactured. One component from that batch will be sent to measuring area for complete quality control and the remaining compone

notes: 機械大三四合開 綜科115 / 智能工廠

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。此課程對製造、設計、動力組甚為重要。內容有：流體靜壓、動壓及熱力學基本觀念、氣液壓傳動元件之靜、動態特性、氣液壓傳動元與機動間之關係、氣液壓傳動元與電腦控制、氣液壓技術實例。
description.en: Review of Fluid Static, Dynamics and Thermodynamics, Static and Dynamic Characteristics of Fluid Transmission Components and System, Computer-Control Fluid Power Systems, Case Study.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 各種有機化合物之檢驗以及常見有機化學反應之實習。
description.en: It covers the testings and preperations of common organic compounds.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，車輛空氣動力學機構，空氣動力學，汽車空氣動力特性，卡車空氣動力特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，汽車行駛安全與舒適，汽車行駛噪音與防治方法，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
description.en: Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, Some aerodynamics fundamentals of fluids mechanics, Aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, Directional stability, Safety and comfort, Wind noise, Mechanisms of noise generation and transmission, Design features。

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

notes: 工管三四與工管所合開；計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生針對不同情境、特定議題加強口語和閱讀能力。此課程以口語訓練為基礎，藉由閱讀相關文章，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握語言技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their speaking and reading ability on some special topics in different situations. It will be an oral-based course, and through reading relative articles, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use the language fluently.

name.zh: 基礎英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 針對高級班學生強化以英文思考及批判整合之進階英文能力，本課程以經典及流行之英文電影為主要教材，分析及應用進階英文的架構、風格及語言特色。
description.en: This course examines a wide variety of classic and popular English language films in order to help advanced students develop their English and critical thinking skills. The course centers its emphasis on the understanding and application of discourse, style and linguistic features of English in films.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Advanced English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調機電專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Mechanical & Electrical Engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 文法寫作及西方哲學概論
name.en: Advanced Grammar, Writing and Introduction to Western Philosophy

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來寫出關於西方文化傳統的基礎概念，如蘇格拉底以前，柏拉圖、荷馬的純哲學以及政治哲學。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種關於課堂閱讀的哲學家的段落寫作。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to read and write about basic concepts from the Western Philosophical Tradition from the pre-Socratics, Plato and metaphysics to Hobbes and political philosophy. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about the philosophers we shall read. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Advanced English Reading and Vocabulary II

name.zh: 基礎文法及流行文化寫作
name.en: Basic Grammar and Writing about Popular Culture

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧在寫作、會話，或其他有關流行文化的議題，像是時尚、設計、音樂短片、卡通、動畫，等等。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及與流行文化有關的各種類型的短評。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en:
Basic Grammar and Writing about Popular Culture
In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to writing and conversation about many products of popular culture including fashion, design, music videos, cartoons, pixar, and so on. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about popular culture. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧在電影短評寫作上。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及關於電影場景、腳色、主題等的短評。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about movies. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about movie plots, characters, themes, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.zh: 本課程盼能透過閱讀西方經典作品，幫助學生能以較為宏觀的視野來看待不同的文化，並能深入了解西方文明。課程將介紹西方文學、歷史以及文化各方面最具影響力的作品，讓不同學門的同學也能有堅實的人文基礎。
description.en: This course aims to help students have a broader view on different cultures and a better understanding of western civilization through reading Western Classics. This course offers a survey of some of the greatest and most influential works on Western literature, philosophy and culture, making non-English major students have a strong base in humanities.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調工程專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 針對高級班學生強化以英文思考及批判整合之進階英文能力，本課程以經典及流行之英文電影為主要教材，分析及應用進階英文的架構、風格及語言特色。
description.en: This course examines a wide variety of classic and popular English language films in order to help advanced students develop their English and critical thinking skills. The course centers its emphasis on the understanding and application of discourse, style and linguistic features of English in films.

notes: 高級 (Advanced)禮拜二第六節自4/2起改至2教205

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Advanced English Reading and Vocabulary II

name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

description.zh: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調設計專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。

name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
