Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh:
在電子化與網路化之經營環境下，生產製造與服務過程中，都會蒐集其中自動產生或人工輸入的資料。本課程學習在資訊平台上，以統計與分析方法以處理大量資料混雜時的管理決策問題，以萃取出有價值的資訊或內隱的知識，做為決策支援與管理之依據。
除介紹問題基本特性，說明資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: Amount of data are collected automatically during manufacturing production and service process. This course aims to introduce how to apply big data analytic and statistical methods for decision making with amount of data and then extracting useful rules or patterns for decision support and management. In addition to lecturing, this course also training students how to analyze the data and learn problem solving techniques through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 物聯網能讓所有能行使獨立功能的普通物體實作互聯互通的網路，在物聯網上，每個人都可以應用電子標籤將真實的物體上網聯結，在物聯網上都可以查出它們的具體位置。通過物聯網可以用中心電腦對機器、裝置、人員進行集中管理、控制，也可以對家庭裝置、汽車進行遙控，以及搜尋位置、防止物品被盜等，類似自動化操控系統，同時透過收集這些小事的資料，最後可以整合成大數據。物聯網將現實世界數位化，應用範圍十分廣泛，包括運輸和物流領域、健康醫療領域範圍、智慧環境（家庭、辦公、工廠）領域、個人和社會領域等，具有十分廣闊的市場和應用前景。本課程將介紹物聯網基本概念、相關技術與應用。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) is the network of physical objects—devices, vehicles, buildings and other items — embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity that enables these objects to collect and exchange data. The IoT allows objects to be sensed and controlled remotely across existing network infrastructure, creating opportunities for more direct integration of the physical world into computer-based systems, and resulting in improved efficiency, accuracy and economic benefit. In this course, concepts, technologies and applications of IoT will be introduced.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

notes: 工管大二合開;計中電腦教室

name.zh: 基礎泥塑與預防性維護

description.zh:
傳統泥塑常見於傳統建築之中，泥塑與剪黏交趾陶同歸一處，包含於傳統建築六大匠師的系統內，至今仍實屬於台灣珍貴的傳統工藝之一。
在本課程中，學員們可習得基礎傳統泥塑之操作能力與專業知識，兩次的校外作品賞析與傳統泥塑延伸工藝的體驗，讓學員得以從不同視角重新理解傳統泥塑，並透過簡單的實作完成兩件泥塑設計的作品。
description.en:
Traditional clay sculpture is commonly found in many Chinese traditional architectures. Clay sculptures and Koji pottery are of the same kind and both included in the six traditional Chinese architectural arts.  They are regarded as the treasure heritages of Taiwan traditional crafts.
In this curriculum, students will learn the professional knowledge of traditional clay sculpture and have the chances to practice the basic steps of making the clay sculpture. To complete two pieces of clay sculptures is required during the course.  There will be two classes of field study, visiting traditional Chinese architectures (e.g. temples or buildings).  During the visiting, students can appreciate the beauty of this fine art and see the transformation of a traditional clay work to art work.  The field study will also enhance their understanding of clay sculptures from a new perspective.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

name.zh: 進階廟宇彩繪修復與預防性維護
name.en: Advanced temple painting repair and preventive maintenance

description.zh: 傳統彩繪是一門貼近生活的民俗工藝，宮廟、佛寺、老宅院皆可看見這門傳統藝術，但國人對此並不熟悉，這些均可以是在地文化，文化創意產業的發源。透過本堂課希望學生能重新認識台灣這門珍貴的民間藝術，也透過實際操作更了解傳統彩繪的作法與精神。
description.en: Traditional painting is a close folk technology to Taiwan human’s life. Palace temple, Buddhist temple, and old mansion can investigate this traditional art but the Taiwanese are not familiar with this, these items could be the basics concerning the land culture and the cultural and creative industry originated. Through this teaching, the class aims to lead the students can re-understand the precious folk art of Taiwan and also learn more about the practice and spirit of traditional painting through practical operation.

description.zh: 透過教學，使學生了解古蹟之建築過程與方法，並實地進行田野調查工作，以培養同學欣賞古蹟建築之美。上課以講授、討論為主，並輔以課外教材（視聽教材）及戶外實地調查，使學生能學以致用，培養對傳統建築工法之實際運用。
description.en: The goal of the course is designed to make all students acquaintance with the processes and the approaches of historical remains through lecturing by the field research to develop the independent abilities of field study. All the lessons are mainly based on lectures and mutual discussions, partly based on videos and audio materials and fieldworks.

description.zh: 量化研究是當代社會與行為科學的強勢典範，統計分析則是量化研究的核心，本課程之目標在於介紹量化方法研究學理、統計知識與基本統計軟體的操作技巧，俾使學生具備使用量化資料驗證研究假設、閱讀統計報表、撰寫研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the theories of quantitative research, basic knowledge about statistics, and the skills of statistics package software in order to enable students to test the hypotheses via quantitative data, interpret report results, and write formal academic reports.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

description.zh: 本課程將帶領同學從兒童詩、繪本、小說、電影來品味兒童文學的真、善與美，藉此喚醒被世俗蒙塵的沉睡心靈，以重返純真的赤子心境。 教學方式以互動為主，期待藉由討論兒童文學名著，閱讀相關論文，來帶領同學進入兒童文學的殿堂。 除了閱讀與討論之外，還會教導同學創作；創作的內容含括了兒童詩及手工繪本製作。希望透過作品的完成，來喚起學生的創作興趣，並建立學生創作的信心。
description.en: This course will lead the students to read the poems, picture books, novels and films of children literature, and hope to find out the beauty of the children's world. Wish in this way can help the sleeping soul to wake up, and return to pure childhood state. This course will try to lead the classmates to appreciate the children's literature by discussing and questioning the masterpieces, hope in this happy way to help the students to get enter the children's literature. Besides reading and discussing, the course will also teach students how to write. The content of writing course would include the poem and the story which would ask the students to finish the work by themselves. Hope through the works, can arouse students' creation interest, and build up students' confidence of creation.

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en:
Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by 
giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

notes: 大碩合開  「修習課程需至校外」

name.zh: 數位行銷多媒體應用實務
name.en: Application of Multimedia Design in digital marketing

description.zh: 數位行銷已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容並輔導同學考取多媒體設計證照，為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach how to design the multimedia in the digital marketing and help students pass the certification .

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

notes: 計中電腦教室, PBL ,大三、大四、研究所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹一系列的光學系統設計概念。其講授內容有單元一：基礎光學與像差理論，單元二：鏡頭設計，單元三：光學系統設計。透過光學實務的研習，可以建立一套完整的光學設計基礎理論，可以協助在研發的光學工程師，在創新發明的競爭戰場上佔得先機，研發順利。
description.en: In this course, we will introduce a series of concepts of the optical system design. The contents are comprising of unit 1: optics basic and aberration theory, unit 2: lens design, unit 3: optical instrument system. The students can build up optical design skills through the practical experiments in the computer examples.

notes: 必選二選一，大三、大四合開，已修習過者請勿重覆修

description.zh: (1)生醫與光學基礎(2)電子膠囊、內視鏡 (3)顯微鏡相關 (4)光學單離 (5)光學嵌住 (6)雷射美容治療相關 (7)光譜分析 (8)光動力治療、光觸媒法 (9)光學斷層掃描 (10)表面電漿子技術 (11)螢光光電檢測 (12)生物晶片(13)放射線影像
description.en:
(1) Basics of bio-optics (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering
(3) Microscopy (4) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection (5) Laser trapping (6) Laser and skin effects
(7) Spectral technology (8) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD) (9)Optical Coherence tomography
(10) Surface plasmons (11) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis (12) Biochip Technology
(13) Bio-imaging

notes: PBL，大三、大四、研究所合開，已修習過者請勿重覆修

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2. explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

notes: 光電大碩與產業接軌合開/擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓同學學習顯示面板相關的理論與瞭解先關產業動向；除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識；此外，本課程內容也包含各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。
description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

notes: 配合友達面板工廠與GOLF系統,課程有時彈性調為整天

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

notes: 本課程邀請智財法官、學者等講授，與智財所合開

name.zh: 電動車機電整合工程師能力培育
name.en: Training for Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 本課程之目的是協助學生考取經濟部專業工程師考試「電動車機電整合工程師能力鑑定」證照，課程內容依照考試科目內容，包含：電動車產業趨勢、各系統基礎原理、機電整合系統的重要元件、各子系統整合的基礎原理；電池技術概論及模組管理與電力安全防護系統、其他系統匹配、?輛動力系統性能設定、動力系統整合、微處理機與介面、電機機械原理、電機驅動原理。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to guide the student to pursue the certification of “Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles” for professional engineers. That is provided by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The contents are: trend of electric vehicle (EV) industry, principle of each system, key components of mechanical and electrical integration system, principle of system integration, battery concept and module management of electric safety, system matching, setting of vehicle powertrain, integration of powertrain, microprocessor and interface, principle of electromechanics, principle of electrical driving.

notes: 車輛大碩與產業接軌合開/週一234節，共12週

description.zh:
1.晶體學基礎
2.張量的基本知識
3.晶體之彈性性質
4.介電晶體之電學性質
5.晶體之傳統光學性質
6.外場作用下晶體之光性
7.晶體之非線性光學性質
8.晶體物性測試
description.en:
1.Fundamental crystallography
2.Introduction to tensor
3.Elastic properties of crystal
4.Electrical properties of Dielectrical crystal
5.Traditional optical properties of crystal
6.Optical properties of crystal in the applied field
7.Non-linear optical properties of crystal
8.Characterication of crystal physical properties

description.zh: 研究複合材料原理及應用，複合材料之高分子科學，預浸料，模壓料，壓力釜成型與真空袋技術，繞線成型，編織成型，熱可塑複合材料，拉擠成型及複合材料力學及應用。
description.en:
The aim of this course is to learn the principle of composite and its application.  Several composite processing methods are included.
They are prepregs, molding compounds, autoclave and vaccum bag method.  Filament winding, braiding, thermoplastic composite, pultrusion are also included.  Finally, mechanic of composite and its application are discussed in detaile.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.zh: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of Thermo-Fluid and Aerodynamics on Offshore Wind Power

description.zh: 離岸風力發電是在海上建設風力發電廠，電廠通常建於大陸礁層(棚)，利用風能進行發電，它較陸上風力發電具有更高的風速，所以能提供更多的電力。面對全球溫室氣體減量趨勢與達成非核家園願景，政府已規劃2025年再生能源發電占比20％之政策目標，為達成此一政策目標，政府規劃以太陽光電及離岸風電作為主力，其中離岸風力原規劃於2025年累計達3 GW（10億瓦）。為了讓學生了解離岸風力發電熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括:(1)離岸風電簡介，(2)流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3)熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4)空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5)電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。
description.en: Offshore wind power is the use of wind farms constructed in bodies of water, usually in the ocean on the continental shelf, to harvest wind energy to generate electricity. Higher wind speeds are available offshore compared to on land, so offshore wind power’s electricity generation is higher per amount of capacity installed. In the face of the trend of global greenhouse gas reduction and the realization of the non-nuclear homeland vision, the government has planned a policy goal of renewable energy generation in the proportion of 20% in 2025. In order to achieve this policy goal, the government plans to use solar photovoltaic and offshore wind power as its main force. Among them, offshore wind power was originally planned to reach 3 GW (1 billion watts) in 2025. To assist students to understand the principle and application of thermo-fluid and aerodynamics on offshore wind power, this course is opened for seniors of undergraduate students and graduate students. The main content includ

notes: 車輛系.能源系所.機械系合開；欲採認研究所學分不得選

description.zh:
本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。
燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：
燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en:
This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.
Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:
Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
description.en: Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.

name.en: Principles and Practices of Parallel Programming

description.zh:
1.  平行概論 
2.  GPU平行計算技術
3.  GPU-CUDA介面 
4.  基礎CUDA程式撰寫 
5.  GPU-CUDA硬體規劃 
6.  進階CUDA程式撰寫
7.   GPU-CUDA最佳化 
8.   GPU-CUDA應用範例練習
description.en:
1.  Introduction to the principles of parallel programming
2.  Introduction to GPU computing 
3.  GPU-CUDA interfaces 
4.  GPU programming using CUDA
5.  Introduction to the hardware of GPU-CUDA 
6.  Advanced CUDA Programming 
7.  Optimization of GPU-CUDA programming 
8.  GPU-CUDA application practices

description.zh: 本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
description.en: Drawing upon modern literary criticism and cultural theory, this course aims to examine the difference between works of literature and the distinctive medium of the cinema. Students will be offered a variety of discussion which stimulates the kinds of critical thinking that lead to a better understanding of the process of transposition from literature to film.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 本課程屬研究所英文畢業門檻,限研究所學生修習

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.zh: 全球議題與趨勢討論(二)
name.en: Discussions on Global Issues and Trends II

description.zh: 本課程欲讓應用英文系學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage English major students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world.  The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

description.zh: 你熱愛文學嗎?你對社會及社會影響世界的方式好不好奇?你想不想探索社會政治事件表面背後的意涵?你喜不喜愛語言? 你是否會對許多故事的力量和神奇之處著迷?如果你的答案是否定的，透過這門課程，你會發現文學提供了既有價值又發人深省的社會觀點。反之，如果你熱愛文學，並且早已深受文學語言的吸引，你在這門課程裡將可從文學間接獲取豐富的生活經驗，進而學會如何理解世界。具體而言，藉由探索文學和社會的互動關係，透過研究社會如何促成文學的產生、賦之予脈絡，並加以型塑，以及文學如何反映、影響、塑造、及改變社會，你將會瞭解文學及語言的力量，更重要的是能在所處之世界裡變得安然自在。我們可能研讀的作品包括，但不限於，Things Fall Apart, Anthills of the Savannah, Uncle Tom’s Cabin, 1984, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close等書。
description.en: Do you have a passion for literature? Are you curious about society and the way it influences the world around us? Would you like to explore the facade of sociopolitical events? Do you love language and are you fascinated by the power and magic of stories? If not, you will nevertheless learn in this course that literature provides a valuable and inspiring perspective on society. On the other hand, if you have already had a strong passion for literature and if you are already fascinated by literary language, you will learn in this course how to make sense of your world by enriching your vicarious experiences of it through literature. Specifically, by exploring the interaction between literature and society, by studying not only how society gives rise to, contextualizes, and molds literature, but also how literature mirrors, influences, shapes, and changes society, you will realize the power of literature and language and, more importantly, become at home in the world. The texts we will

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生掌握觀看的方法和分析的能力，視覺媒介包括繪畫、雕塑、電影和攝影 。學生將學習基本的藝術分析技巧，例如敘述、形式特徵、歷史背景和不同的解讀方法。上課方式包括小組討論，口頭報告和書面作業，以訓練學生的視覺感受能力、分析能力、英語和創造力。如有機會將安排參觀博物館所舉辦之展覽。
description.en: This course aims to equip students with analytical capabilities regarding different genres in visual culture, including paintings, sculpture, film and photography. Students will be introduced to basic skills analytical techniques in a work of arts, including describing, formal features, historical background, and possible interpretations. Through group discussion exercises, presentations, and writing assignments, students’ visual sensibility, English speaking and writing abilities, and creativity will be trained. Visits to museums for appropriate exhibitions may be arranged.

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧在電影短評寫作上。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及關於電影場景、腳色、主題等的短評。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about movies. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about movie plots, characters, themes, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

name.zh: 從美國大眾媒體學英文
name.en: Learning English through American Mass Media

description.zh: 本課程帶領非英文系高級班的學生了解深植在英文詞句中的美國主流文化價值。學生除了會學到語言是了解文化的途徑之一外，也會理解文化對語言用詞的影響。課程內容涵蓋電影、電視節目、新聞、音樂、青少年文學等等。
description.en: This course enables non-English majors at the advanced level to understand American mainstream cultural values embedded in English language expressions. Students will learn that language is a guide to culture, and on the other hand, culture programs language patterns. Selected texts include films, television shows, news, music, young adult literature, etc.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

description.zh:
課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：
●車牌與門牌數字辨識
●人臉辨識
●1000種影像分類
●辨識9000種物件  
●自動駕駛模擬
●嵌入式深度學習演算法
空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:
●遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人
●對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人
●深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en:
The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:
●Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate
●Face Recognition
●1000 Image Classification
●9000 Object Detection
●Autopilot simulation
●Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms
●Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)
●Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)
●Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)
●Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)
●Deep Reinforcement Learning

notes: 電子大四、電子所.電資外生所.產業接軌合開

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CAD軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

description.zh:
1.傅利葉轉換
2.離散及快速傅利葉轉換
3.IFR濾波器
4.FIR濾波器
5.專題
description.en:
1.Fourier Series and Transform
2.DDFT and FFT
3.IIR filter
4.FIR filter
5.Special projects

description.zh: 使學生熟悉燃料電池之種類、特性、原理等相關知識。訓練學生具備運用氫能之潔淨能源，來取代具污染性能源的能力，培養學生善用潔淨能源與環境保護之態度與觀念，實際瞭解燃料電池系統之運作。授課內容為：燃料電池系統簡介、效率與開路電流電壓、質子交換膜燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、電化學反應熱力學、燃料電池類別、專題報告與實驗。

name.en: Paper’s Fiber Culture and Its Application

description.zh:
透過認識紙質、纖維實驗與材質研發的單元設計貫穿、活化課程，也由此串聯課程理念。達到培育美學素養、認識材質特性、應用紙藝與纖維文化。學生可透過選修這門課，養成美學素養、材質特色認識、紙藝與纖維文化應用。課程為理論與實務之結合，包含 : 1. 文化藝術與自然科學知識之傳授。2. 創意設計實作。後者(2)可做為檢視學生對前者(1)的學習與吸收狀況。作業訓練達到二項目標 : 
1. 加強產學合作，強化實務教學。2. 培育紙質與纖維創意設計人才。
description.en: With the help of curricular components of paper qualities, fiber experiments as well as R&D on raw materials, the course essentials can thus be unified and the theme vitalized. WE aim to provide the course with aesthetical principles, knowledge of the raw materials, applied paper craftsmanship and fiber civilization—which will be comprehensively instilled into the course so that the students who take the course will be equipped with a good command on them. The course is made up of both aesthetical theory and practice, including a) knowledge on culture, arts and natural science and b) innovative & creative practice, with the later utilized as criteria to evaluate to what extent the students are successfully trained. The assigned homework is set so as to: 1. Enforce cooperation between industry and academics and strengthen course materials into practice; 2. Train and discipline more design talents in paper qualities and innovation in fiber.

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. 
By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三四與建都所日職合開

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

notes: 土木大三大四合開/上限40人

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 風工程是一個跨領域的學科，屬於研究所課程，適合已有良好工程力學以及流體力學基礎的學生選修。然而為了推廣我國工程師及土木系大學生了解此門學問，本課程設計為大四及研究所學生選修的先導型課程。本課程內容涵蓋大氣邊界層、鈍體空氣動力學以及空氣彈力學的基礎知識，進而闡述建築物耐風設計以及橋梁耐風設計的概念，配合我國以及國際上常用之耐風設計規範作為解說及練習，輔助學生對於風工程有一定的認識。其他如空氣污染擴散、通風節能減熱、計算流體力學應用等與風相關的主題，亦在本課程提出概略性的介紹以及發展現況。
description.en: Wind Engineering is a cross-disciplinary subject that belongs to the institute course and is suitable for students who have a good background in engineering mechanics and fluid mechanics. However, in order to promote the knowledge of Wind Engineering to engineers and civil engineering students, this course is designed as the precursor courses selected by seniors and graduate students. This course covers the basic knowledge of atmospheric boundary layer, bluff body aerodynamics and air-elasticity, and then expounds the wind-resistant design of buildings and the concept of wind-resistant design of bridges. It is used as an explanation and practice with the wind-resistant design codes commonly used internationally. Students have a certain understanding of wind engineering. Other wind-related topics such as air pollution diffusion, ventilation energy conservation and heat reduction, computational fluid dynamics applications, etc., also provide a brief introduction and development status in

notes: 土木大四與防災所合開/上限20人/兼任羅元隆老師

name.en: Fundamentals of Digital Design for Architecture

description.zh: 本課程講授並實際演練針對建築設計領域中基礎的數位實務技術，包括數位模型建構及後續之應用，以增進學習者在設計操作及媒材表現上的能力。
description.en: The course aims to properly prepare students their skills in digital design through demonstrations and hands-on exercises. Basic digital skill sets including modeling and rendering software tools and computational thinking applied to architecture would be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程的內容包括：HTML語法、ASP程式語言、網頁與資料庫連結、XML語法簡介、JSP語法簡介、製造業應用展示說明。
description.en: Brief: This course covers different programming languages and technologies used to construct Web Based Systems, such as HTML, ASP, Connection to Database Systems, XML, JSP, etc. Some examples applied to industries are also introduced.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

notes: 以多益750分為目標；外師授課

description.zh: 本課程以聽力訓練為基礎，藉由對不同情境對話培養英文聽力，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論，影片和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握聽力技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their listening skills in different situations. This is a listening-based course, and through listening to different dialogues, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion, video-watching and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use listening skills.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

name.en: Integration Technology for Networking Manufacturing Systems

description.zh: 製造聯網整合技術配合感測器、控制器、網路系統等，讓人、機器人、原物料、零組件、重要物品或設備，取得人、機、料、法、環的訊息，透過大數據分析與人工智慧，執行各種事前診斷預防、維護、事發處置及事後重建與改善的動作。本課程著重於製造聯網整合技術與實施方法，特別在智能工廠技術包含IoT、感測器設計與選擇、機電整合、數據分析、預防診斷與維修、智慧適應控制等。
description.en: Integration technology for networking manufacturing systems integrates sensor, controller, networking system, etc.. This technology uses big data analysis and artificial intelligence to communicate among human, robot, raw material, parts, important article or equipment, which can do prediction, protection, and improvement, etc.. This course focuses on integration technology for networking manufacturing systems and its practical implementation. The intelligent factory consists of IoT, design and selection of sensors, integration of electromechanics, data analysis, preventive diagnosis and repair, intelligent adaptive control, etc..

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

notes: 機械大四與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽(if & reddot)為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions(if & reddot), guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh:
Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、I公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。 使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計
模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives. Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions. Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysis Design Feature Attribute Mapping (Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 一教101；工設三四與日職創新所合開/創新創業課程

description.zh:
1.導論
2.策略藍圖
3.營運管理流程
4.顧客管理流程
5.創新管理流程
6.法規與社會流程
7.無形資產與企業策略之對焦
8.組織資本準備程度
9.資訊資本齊備程度
10.人力資本齊備程度
11.根據企業策略客制化策略藍圖
12.策略藍圖執行之企劃
description.en:
1.Introduction
2.Strategy Maps
3.Operations Management Processes
4.Customer Management Processes
5.Innovation Management processes
6.Regulatory and Social Processes
7.Aligning Intangible Assets to Enterprise Strategy
8.Organization Capital Readiness
9.Information Capital Readiness
10.Human Capital Readiness
11.Customizing Your Strategy Map to Your Strategy
12.Planning the Campaign

notes: 電子大三大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. Cloud database technology is the core of an intelligent factory, which can reach the intelligent network and control from intelligent production order to website control.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC Layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所.電子系與產業接軌合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

notes: 大三、大四、碩班合開/科研大樓243

description.zh: 本課程包括(一)基礎的光電子學之學理介紹，內容包括：量子力學概念、半導體、電磁學；(二)光的傳輸，內容包括：光在介質中的傳輸、光導波管、光偶合；(三)光的產生，內容包括：半導體的發光機制及半導體雷射。
description.en: This course includes (I) the introduction of basic concepts of photonics, including basic quantum mechanics, basic semiconductor electronics, electromagnetics; (II) proipagation of light, including light propagation in media, optical wave-guide theory, wave-guide couplers; (III)generation of light, including optical prosesses in semiconductors and semiconductor lasers.

notes: 擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號；大碩合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業(工業)相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之套特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1.The Characters of business laws. 2.The presentment of civil code. 3.The business registration laws and business laws. 4.The insurance laws.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹期貨、選擇權與相關衍生性金融商品的理論基礎與實務概念，了解衍生性金融商品在套利、避險與投機策略上的應用。課程內容包含期貨與選擇權兩個部分：在期貨議題方面，主要介紹期貨市場的組織結構、期貨契約的理論價格、以及避險策略；在選擇權議題方面，則是涵蓋選擇權市場的介紹、選擇權的理論價格、交易策略、與市場資訊分析。藉由對期貨與選擇權理論基礎的建構，期望能強化同學對於衍生性金融商品的實務應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to the theoretical and practical aspects of financial futures, options, and other derivatives. Derivatives have become one of the most important tools of modern finance, from both the academic and the practical standpoint. They are used for compensation, speculation, yield enhancements of investments, and, most importantly, for risk management. This course consists of two parts. The first part of the course deals with futures issues including the structure of futures markets, pricing of futures contracts, and hedging with such contracts. The second part of the course deals with options issues including options markets, strategies, pricing, and hedging analysis. Students will learn about the theoretical underpinnings and the practical applications in real world of derivative securities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授就宏觀的角度，分析總體經濟環境，包括產出、失業率、通貨膨脹率、物價、利率與匯率等。課程分別就不同學派的理論，至貨幣與實質景氣循環等模型理論，說明其政策主張。
description.en: This course is designed to teach the overall economic environment from a macro perspective, including output, unemployment, inflation, prices, interest rates and exchange rates. The course explains the policy propositions on the theory of different schools, to the model theory of currency and substantive cycle.

description.zh: 本課程介紹成本會計基本概念與運作系統，以及材料、人工與製造費用如何設帳與控制，並應用於管理層面，以提高生產效率，分析成本並降低成本。
description.en:
Cost Accounting provide information needed by management to planning and controlling the production cost, increase efficiency and reduce cost, then make more profit.
Cost Accounting covers three major topic areas:
1.	cost concept
2.	cost accounting system
3.	cost analysis and cost control

description.zh: 資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹,基礎密碼學介紹,電腦病毒與惡意程式,網路安全與攻擊,網路安全防護,應用層安全, 網頁安全,雲端安全,物聯網安全,個人資料保護
description.en: Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection

notes: 大三、大四合開/科研大樓240

description.zh: 本課程分為上下學期，介紹如何將金融操作方式，以明確演算法去定義、描述，進而用R語言、XQ、或MultiChart去模擬、執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、交易策略研發、回測系統、資金管理。此外，本課程邀請嘉實資訊經理擔任業師課程指導。嘉實資訊為國內最大財金資訊軟體公司，其業師將帶領同學銜接上學期課程，透過XQ交易系統進行撰寫XS語法。
description.en:
This course is divided into two semesters. It introduces how to use financial operations to define and describe clearly the algorithm, and then uses R language, XQ, or MultiChart to simulate and execute. Contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, backtesting, and fund management.
In additions, this course invites the SysJust company to serve as a professional mentor. SysJust company is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. Its industry lecturer will lead students to contact the XQ trading system and write XS grammar for financial trading.

notes: 大四、碩班合開/科研大樓243

description.zh: 在日益競爭的企業商戰中，如何爭取、鞏固、善待以及維繫住主要顧客，並提高顧客忠誠度，創造顧客最高價值，已是當今企業非常重要的課題。本課程將藉由理論與應用案例，並搭配多元參考資料介紹顧客關係管理的理論與實務，以了解企業如何達到精準行銷並鞏固顧客忠誠度的目標。
description.en: In the increasingly competitive business battles, how to fight for, consolidate, treat and maintain major customers, improve customer loyalty and create the highest value of customers is a very important issue for today's enterprises. This course will introduce the theory and practice of customer relationship management with theory and application cases, and with multiple reference materials to understand how companies can achieve the goals of accurate marketing and strengthening customer loyalty.

notes: 大三、大四合開/科研大樓240

description.zh:
藉由人工智慧的教學，使得學生有全面性的大局觀，及瞭解人工智慧是如何運作的，以及它的能力、侷限及未來發展，當投入各行業欲以人工智慧進行升級時，及協助企業能以人工智慧解決問題，有清楚的方向感來帶領企業前進。
1. 瞭解人工智慧??基礎
2. 瞭解人工智慧應用的方向
3. 可以熟?工具的操作，結合??與實務
description.en:
Through the teaching of artificial intelligence, students have a comprehensive view of the overall situation, and understand how artificial intelligence works, as well as its capabilities, limitations and future development. When investing in various industries to upgrade with artificial intelligence, and assisting enterprises to solve problems with artificial intelligence, the purpose of the course is to have a clear sense of direction to lead the enterprise forward.
1. Understand the basics of artificial intelligence
2. Understand the direction of artificial intelligence applications
3. Can be familiar with the operation of the tool, combined with theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹使用於智慧家庭、智慧製造與智慧醫療應用的感測器結構與基本工作原理，包含光學感測原理、半導體感測原理、機械感測原理、化學感測原理、生物感測原理、各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計與近期的感測技術基礎科學發展與議題。
description.en: This course introduces the sensor structure and basic working principles used in smart home, smart manufacturing and smart medical applications, including optical sensors, semiconductor sensors, mechanical sensors, electrochemical sensors, biosensors. Moreover, we will discuss various sensor measurement systems, conversion interface circuit design, and recent scientific development."

notes: 光電二三+智慧感測與應用國際學程合開

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

notes: 法治向度，A班，修習課程需至校外服務

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 學習邏輯推理主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life. This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

description.zh: 學習邏輯推理主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh:
經濟學重視邏輯與嚴謹推理的理性特質是其主要特色，此亦為理工科系人之專長優勢，然而僅偏重左腦訓練的人才往往讓人覺得生冷機械，對事物看法也常過於直接而缺乏人情，若能在不失理性效率之下，兼顧以人為本之社會人文感性關懷，則經濟學自無愧為社會科學之母，其訓練目標亦與通識教育的人格均衡發展目的一致！
為避免陷入一般經濟教學因理論工具比重過高而失焦，導致學生學習興趣驟減以致成效不彰，本課程重點在於先讓學生擁有強烈之學習動機，接著認知到"確立學習目的"的重要性，藉由生活實例直接帶領學生面對並感受問題，從而引導出經濟學切入問題的思維方式，並傳授其正確可行的學習態度與方法，同時提醒學生維持對專業知識批判的精神，在嚴謹訓練架構下督促其尋求感性的意涵，因而不致陷入經濟工具與名詞的浩瀚泥沼中，從而漸進體會出經濟學之精髓。
description.en:
The science of economics is characterized by logics and cautious reasoning-at which most of the students of natural science and technology are good at. It is also a fact that those who take better advantage of the right brain are very likely to be straightforward and thus seemingly more mechanical and unsympathetic. Economics can be seen as the mother of science under the condition that rational efficiency-as well as the socially humanity--are kept at the same time. As a matter of act, the economic trainings share the same goal as what is required by the General Education courses.
The first priority of the course is to highly motivate the students in the economic issues. We do our best to avoid too much weight generally put into teaching economics, leading to poor learning and teaching experience. Cases are studied in such a way that students will recognize the "real purpose of studying."  Real cases and examples are brought into discussion. We guide the students to"feel"the problems.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。

description.zh:
新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避�УP大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。
新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。
課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en:
Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.
    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

description.zh:
透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。
創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en:
The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.
The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 「生活美學」是現代人依據東西方文化及各方美學的定義所推論出來的名詞，指應用於「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動。依循相異的生活型態、社會環境，人類試圖重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的當代美學。
description.en: “Aesthetics of living " will address the East-West cultural and aesthetic experience through series of questions that drive the discourse in contemporary life’s content and activities. Following the different lifestyles, social environment, human tries to reconstruct everyday life into contemporary aesthetics of living. This course aims to encourage students to think what is aesthetic of living, through the real life and spiritual life and concerned itself with the aesthetic problems in the lives of others.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

name.en: The History and Culture of Taiwan

description.zh: 台灣位處東南亞與東北亞島弧的中介點，是亞洲大陸與太平洋的接點，因此，歷來有許多不同族群移居，因而形成多彩多樣的多元價值觀並容兼蓄的文化觀。本課程將論述介紹台灣南島文化、荷西殖民時期的基督教、漢人文化、日本文化和近代文明等在台灣社會產生的影響。
description.en: The island of Taiwan is located in the middle of the island arc of Southeastern and Northeastern Asia. Further, it is the intersection of the Asian continent and the Pacific Ocean. Since many different ethnic groups have migrated in together, a multi-dimensional view of value-colorful in itself has thus been formed. This course will make a first-step introduction and discussion on the impact over the Taiwan society processed by the cultural mix of the Austronesians, the Christianity under the occupation of the Netherlands and Spain, the Hans, the Japanese and the modern civilization.

description.zh: 歷史相關研究蓬勃發展迄今，不論是史料或新舊的研究著作重新被重視、翻譯與詮釋，這些可稱之為史學著作的經典。這些書籍既有趣味又有意義，捧而讀之，中西歷史、古往今來的風物民情、地貌變遷等流轉仿彿躍於紙上。本課程將介紹這些經典的、趣味的、有意義的歷史名著，藉由數本好書，進而瞭解人類的歷史。
description.en: Since the study of the history has been in prosperity, a large number of historical texts have been newly translated and interpreted, thus gaining more importance. These texts can be categorized as classical volumes of history . There have been existent a lot of other written resources interesting and meaningful exhibiting the vivid image of the people, geography, folk stories and the transition of time available in history. This course focuses on these particular materials concerning the human history through the discussion of which, the history of mankind can be better understood.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

name.en: The History and Culture of Taiwan

description.zh: 台灣位處東南亞與東北亞島弧的中介點，是亞洲大陸與太平洋的接點，因此，歷來有許多不同族群移居，因而形成多彩多樣的多元價值觀並容兼蓄的文化觀。本課程將論述介紹台灣南島文化、荷西殖民時期的基督教、漢人文化、日本文化和近代文明等在台灣社會產生的影響。
description.en: The island of Taiwan is located in the middle of the island arc of Southeastern and Northeastern Asia. Further, it is the intersection of the Asian continent and the Pacific Ocean. Since many different ethnic groups have migrated in together, a multi-dimensional view of value-colorful in itself has thus been formed. This course will make a first-step introduction and discussion on the impact over the Taiwan society processed by the cultural mix of the Austronesians, the Christianity under the occupation of the Netherlands and Spain, the Hans, the Japanese and the modern civilization.

description.zh: 歷史相關研究蓬勃發展迄今，不論是史料或新舊的研究著作重新被重視、翻譯與詮釋，這些可稱之為史學著作的經典。這些書籍既有趣味又有意義，捧而讀之，中西歷史、古往今來的風物民情、地貌變遷等流轉仿彿躍於紙上。本課程將介紹這些經典的、趣味的、有意義的歷史名著，藉由數本好書，進而瞭解人類的歷史。
description.en: Since the study of the history has been in prosperity, a large number of historical texts have been newly translated and interpreted, thus gaining more importance. These texts can be categorized as classical volumes of history . There have been existent a lot of other written resources interesting and meaningful exhibiting the vivid image of the people, geography, folk stories and the transition of time available in history. This course focuses on these particular materials concerning the human history through the discussion of which, the history of mankind can be better understood.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
