name.zh: 設計思考：創意與創新策略

description.zh: 本課程提供學生一個與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗創意設計與創新策略的最佳實務。課程內容包括設計思考、創新品牌、設計觀察與創新流程等專題講座，和創意設計組織與設計公司等實地參觀見習。
description.en: This course is to provide with a platform on which students can experience the best practice of creative & innovation. The contents include of design thinking, Brand in innovation, observation and innovation process, as well as study tours of creative design organizations, and design agents.

notes: 工設二三與創新所合開

description.zh: 本課程結合社會學學理與電影藝術，透過社會學主題的電影放映、講師的前導說明，以及映後座談討論，激發學生對於社會議題探究的興趣，以及開啟以影像進行社會學思辨的能力。
description.en: Combining sociology and film art, this course is aimed at stimulating students' interests in social issues and cultivating the ability of sociological thinking through sociological thematic film screenings, lecturer's preface instructions, and post-screening discussion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提供已有器樂或聲樂基礎的學生，透過同儕間的互相學習與實作，發掘音樂演奏的樂趣。在授課教師指導下，同學將進行室內樂分組，探討不同作曲家和各種曲風，並學習如何詮釋樂曲，增進演奏技能。期末將在校內和公益機構舉辦成果發表會，將音樂的美妙與幸福帶給周遭的人。
description.en: This course opens to students who already know the basics of instrumental or vocal playing. Through ensemble practices with classmates and group lessons, students will discover the fun of music-making. Under the teacher’s guidance, students are grouped to form ensembles, explore various composers and musical styles, learn about music interpretation, and improve their own performance skills. At the end of the semester, there will be presentation concerts at school and non-profit organization, bringing the beauty and happiness of music to people around us.

description.zh: 該課程特點在於提高學生走出教室，以社會學概念觀察並分析社會休閒現象。同時也包含課堂討論以及觀察報告，建立社會學知識與社會生活的連結。培養學生社會學想像的能力，以文字、圖片或影像紀錄方式，從休閒活動的探討巨觀結構以及微觀社會互動的連結。
description.en: This course encourages students to walk out of classroom and applies sociological concepts to observe and analyze social leisure activities. This course also includes discussions in classroom and observation report, aiming to link sociological knowledge and social life. The course intends to develop students’ sociological imagination, use words, photographs, and videos to record social leisure life, and investigate link between social interactions at micro-level and social structure at macro-level.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

name.zh: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of Thermo-Fluid and Aerodynamics on Offshore Wind Power

description.zh: 離岸風力發電是在海上建設風力發電廠，電廠通常建於大陸礁層(棚)，利用風能進行發電，它較陸上風力發電具有更高的風速，所以能提供更多的電力。面對全球溫室氣體減量趨勢與達成非核家園願景，政府已規劃2025年再生能源發電占比20％之政策目標，為達成此一政策目標，政府規劃以太陽光電及離岸風電作為主力，其中離岸風力原規劃於2025年累計達3 GW（10億瓦）。為了讓學生了解離岸風力發電熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括:(1)離岸風電簡介，(2)流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3)熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4)空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5)電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。
description.en: Offshore wind power is the use of wind farms constructed in bodies of water, usually in the ocean on the continental shelf, to harvest wind energy to generate electricity. Higher wind speeds are available offshore compared to on land, so offshore wind power’s electricity generation is higher per amount of capacity installed. In the face of the trend of global greenhouse gas reduction and the realization of the non-nuclear homeland vision, the government has planned a policy goal of renewable energy generation in the proportion of 20% in 2025. In order to achieve this policy goal, the government plans to use solar photovoltaic and offshore wind power as its main force. Among them, offshore wind power was originally planned to reach 3 GW (1 billion watts) in 2025. To assist students to understand the principle and application of thermo-fluid and aerodynamics on offshore wind power, this course is opened for seniors of undergraduate students and graduate students. The main content includ

notes: 車輛系.能源系所.機械系合開

Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修社哲.自然/教師施麗雯/3003教室【停開】

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

description.zh:
由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。

基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en:
In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.

This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

description.zh: 本課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

notes: 化工大四與化工所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 資財系所與教務處創創專區合開【停開】

name.zh: 陶瓷製程與性質之最佳化改良法
name.en: Optimization of ceramic process and properties

description.zh: 培養學生主動發現問題，或由企業所提出的問題，訓練學生思考如何運用專業知識與技能解決實驗問題。目前針對電子陶瓷相關的產業，對於具有產品的陶瓷製程與性質改良法的專業知識人才，急迫需要，故利用企業命題的問題導向課程方式，訓練學生具有解決產業實際問題與需求的能力。
description.en: Train students to discover problems proactively, or ask questions from companies to train students to think about how to apply professional knowledge and skills to solve experimental problems. At present, for professional knowledge talents with ceramic process and property improvement methods for products, there is an urgent need. Therefore, the problem-oriented curriculum method of the enterprise proposition is used to train students to have the ability to solve practical problems and needs of the industry.

notes: 材資三甲四甲合開，PBL課程

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修法治/教師梁志鳴/3001教室

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修社哲/教師王冠生/公1F03教室

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修文史/教師楊子政/文4F06教室

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所.電子系與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修美學/教師林子晴/商1F01教室【停開】

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.

description.zh: 使學員瞭解Python程式語言於機器學習應用，以及機器學習的理論背景、評估如何使用適當的演算法於實際例子、內容包括回歸分析於資料預測、資料維度減少方法於資料特徵提取、資料分類方法包括支援向量機與類神經網路方法。課程主要配合Python例子增進學員了解機器學習的相關知識與提升在資訊處理時代之競爭力。
description.en: Students should be familiar with the basic concepts of machine learning (ML), probability theory, probability distribution, ML algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering taught in this class.

notes: 機械大四、機電所與自動化所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，並於開學前向各系提出申請，由本系專任老師擔任指導教師，審查計畫及評核學期成績。
description.en:
This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 
In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities and then submit their plans to the departmental office for approval by the beginning of the semester.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
    學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，向指導教師提出計畫審查。指導教師同意後，學生於加退選週結束前向系辦公室登記申請。
description.en:
This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 

In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities, and submit to their instructors for approval. With instructors’ approval, they need to make registration to the departmental office for application by the end of the add/drop course selection weeks of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至機械相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative mechanical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至電機相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation is carried out in one of the corporative electrical engineering company during curriculum session. The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。

A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。

Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，修課學生必須至化學、化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作工廠所提供之實質訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用全學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during full curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for full-time at least 4.5 months. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields in one of the corporative engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative mechanical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得長期(一學年)體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their long working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生學期中至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習至少為期4.5個月。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of 4.5 months. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗光電產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。

Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。 學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，向指導教師提出計畫審查。指導教師同意後，學生於加退選週結束前向系辦公室登記申請。
description.en: This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities, and submit to their instructors for approval. With instructors’ approval, they need to make registration to the departmental office for application by the end of the add/drop course selection weeks of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導技優學生選定研究題目，培養實務能力，進行問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the well-skilled students to complete special projects in research and development through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report.

notes: 電資學院-顯示器控制電路實驗

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: 區塊鏈智能合約與區塊鏈遊戲實作
name.en: Using Blockchain/Ethereum Tech and smart contract launch personalized and tradable tokens

description.zh: 這是為初學者設計的課程。有寫程式相關的經驗是一個優點，但不是必須的。課程將包括逐步指導，初探區塊鏈世界，介紹區塊鏈遊戲發展與價值。預期的學習成果為發展一款區塊鏈遊戲。（建議使用Mac或Linux系統）
description.en:
his is a course designed for beginners.
Using Blockchain/Ethereum Tech and smart contract launch personalized and tradable tokens.
Expected results for the development of blockchain games.
